resources.string: Just take your phone and touch\nyour chosen cart to get started
You\'ve chosen cart #123\nYou\'ll have 3hrs to use it!
When you\'re done, please return the\ncart to the enclosure to finish

Now that your shopping
experience is complete, we look
forward to seeing you as part of
our bounty program!

You failed to return the cart.
It is now considered stolen.
We have fined your account.
I hope you feel good about yourself.
